total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the different colors in the grid.
Q2: Determine the boundaries of each color region.
Q3: Identify the smallest rectangle that can contain each color region.
Q4: Remove the parts of the rectangle that are not part of the color region.
Q5: Arrange the resulting rectangles from top to bottom and left to right according to their position in the original grid.
Q6: Combine these rectangles into a single grid.
Q1: Identify the different colors in the grid.
Q2: Determine the boundaries of each color region.
Q3: Identify the smallest rectangle that can contain each color region.
Q4: Crop the grid to only include the rectangles identified in Q3.
Q5: Arrange the cropped rectangles from top to bottom and left to right based on their original positions in the input grid.
